name: canshare-who5-haematology-peripheral-t-cell-lymphoma-histology
title: NZ WHO haematolymphoid peripheral T cell lymphoma histology (5th edition)
description: Histologies used for peripheral T cell lymphoma (WHO Classification of Tumours, Haematolymphoid Tumours, 5th edition) or an 'Other' value.

filter.value: ^ 297181000210101 |New Zealand WHO classification of tumours (5th edition) haematolymphoid peripheral T-cell lymphoma histology reference set| OR 74964007 |Other|

contains.display: ALK negative anaplastic large cell lymphoma
Anaplastic lymphoma kinase positive anaplastic large cell lymphoma
Breast implant-associated anaplastic large cell lymphoma
Nodal angioimmunoblastic T cell lymphoma with T follicular helper phenotype
Nodal follicular T cell lymphoma with follicular helper phenotype
Nodal T cell lymphoma with follicular helper phenotype without defining characteristics
Peripheral T cell lymphoma without defining characteristics
